eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Blanco; Gonzales; Hays; Karnes; Kendall; Travis, TX; AT 09:27 AM ON OCT 11, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:27 AM OCT 12, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Local AMBER Alert: Missing/Possibly Abducted Child from Bee Cave, TX. Missing child is Penelope Hernandez, 11 year old hispanic female last seen wearing light blue sleeve shirt, gray basketball shorts, unicorn backpack and a brown shoulder purse. Has circle scars on both forearms. Call Bee Cave Police Department with information. If seen call 9 1 1.
